mapper.select: SELECT sp.id, sp.sys_name name, sp.description, sp.url, sp.pid FROM sys_permission sp

SELECT sp.id, sp.sys_name name, sp.description, sp.url, sp.pid FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru on su.id= sru.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr on sru.sys_role_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_permission_role spr on spr.role_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_permission sp on sp.id = spr.permission_id WHERE su.id=#{userId}
